changes.description: Add experimental MessageListener component
Fix scroll issues with List virtualization
Added itemRequiredIndicator property to Form to control required/optional indicators for FormItems on the form level.
make goto-definition reach components across the whole opened workspace
Change the indicator in TableOfContents
Add iconAlignment to NavLink and NavGroup
Add new Theme variables to NavLink and NavGroup
Experiment with documentation theme
Add overflowMode and breakMode to Markdown
Renamed requiredIndicator to requireLabelMode and itemRequiredIndicator to itemRequireLabelMode.
In the Search box, hitting Enter opens the first match when none selected.
Added requiredIndicator property to FormItem to customize required/optional indicators next to labels. Options are: "required", "optional", "both". Default is "required".
Fix alignment issues with Text
Fix Column sortable regression
Fix List visibility issue in Markdown
Removed language-server-web-worker export from package.json
FileInput: Automate parsing of csv/json.
Fixed a bug where gaps were still rendered even if there were no labels provided for input fields.
Fixed incorrect background color for a number of components: AutoComplete, Form, NoResult, TextBox and other input controls.
Fixed FlowLayout passing down width incorrectly to its children.
Add openLinkNewTab property to Markdown.
Add Markdown property truncateLinks
Add support for rowspan and colspan attributes in Markdown tables
Fix star-sizing in App layouts
Fix state APICall and DataSource state references
Add experimental bookmark behavior
feat: add context, line-col numbers to script parse errors
Add "stretch" property to Stack
Add scroll APIs to Stack, Card, and FlowLayout
Variables defined in <script> override variables in component attributes
Add stretch property to Stack, Splitter, and FlowLayout
Fix vertically-aligned Text with overflowType="ellipsis"
Fix FlowLayout issue with nested Text using ellipsis
Fix the issues with the List scroll API
Add verticalAlignment support to FlowLayout
feat: implement formBindingBehavior
Clip pixel artifacts experienced with Text overflowMode
Fix issues with empty script tag rendering
Fix state variables
Add Add status/progress to APICall
Make valueTemplate of Select available in single-select mode
fix: building in CONFIG_ONLY mode handles windows paths
Fix standalone app component discovery in templates
Add credentials option to DataSource/APICall
Fix the rendering issues with an attributeless Theme component
Add "Br" component as an alias to "br"
Fix the TableOfContents navigation issue
Fix the wrong Select height with searchable="true"
feat: Pages - remember scroll-state of page
Fixed regular Select (non-searchable/multiSelect) not having a wide enough dropdown list if input is sized using percentages.
fix: building a projcet in configOnly mode no longer throws the error 'glob.glob is not a function'
Experiment with "init" and "cleanup" component events
The <script> tag will hoist declarations and ignores non-declaration statements
Add experimental "init" event to components
fix: variant styling issue
Add signature and parameter descriptions to component event metadata
Introduce theme-context-relative fontSize theme variables
Fix Form submit with nested Forms (ModalDialog)
fix: patternInvalidSeverity - phone pattern
fix: DatePicker to adjust its font size and spacing to the current font size
fix: NumberBox startText and endText uses different color than TextBox
Implement the ideal text (attributes) typography flow
Form's $data is now available in buttonRowTemplate
Fixed FormItem not passing the ungroupedHeaderTemplate and groupHeaderTemplate properties to underlying Select.
Experimental <template> helper tag added
fix: update disabled text color
improve: use the Select component in the Table as the page size selector
feat: pagination controls should only appear in a Table as necessary, alwaysShowPagination - explicitly toggles pagination controls visibility
Extend ModalDialog with titleTemplate and title-related theme variables

Add grayscale prop to Image and Markdown components. Images can now be displayed in grayscale by setting `grayscale="true"` on either the Image component or the Markdown component (which applies to all images within the markdown content).
fix: table pagination design on mobile
App component refactored
Add app state management with global functions
Add a removeBr property to Markdown
Reworked and standardized disabled input control visuals.
fix: validationResult's position
Matched the structure of the $error context value and the returned object in onError. Updated APICall and Datasource docs to detail changes.
feat: Select - handle option groups in the dropdown list
Added property rowUnselectablePredicate to Table to manage per row selection.
feat: Select - handle ungrouped options, ungroupedHeaderTemplate
Only show sorting indicators in the Table when the user hovers/focuses or orders by a column.
Add isDirty() API to Form
fix formItem initialValue with async loaded null field value
Add getData() API to Form
Add disableInlineStyle property to Theme
refactor: improve Breakout component to handle different layouts
refactor: use radix for dropdown menu implementation
Inline styles can be disabled witht "appGlobals.disableInlineStyle: true" setting
